Transfer-Client 2.4

The Transfer-Client is a Java application for transfering data via Sedex. It offers a graphical user interface to the end-user for controlling the sending process. In detail, the Transfer-Client provides the following tasks:
  • Task 1: Waiting for incoming result files.
  • Task 2: Moving the result files to the stage folder.
  • Task 3: Creating sedex envelope files.
  • Task 4: Moving the result files together with the generated envelope files to the outbox sedex folder.
  • Task 5: Waiting for receipts.

Packages 
Package Description
ch.zh.transferclient.annotationservices
Provides classes for documenting the source code.
ch.zh.transferclient.controller
Provides classes for controlling the transfer process.
ch.zh.transferclient.gui
Provides classes for the graphical user interface.
ch.zh.transferclient.main
Provides classes for starting and stopping the application.
ch.zh.transferclient.processing
Provides classes for the main functionalities of the Transfer-Client.
ch.zh.transferclient.properties
Provides classes for managing the properties.
ch.zh.transferclient.util
Provides classes for utility purposes.
